class=\"feed-title\">Now</h2><!--set: now_item_774984766213593598_false_desktop_2018-04-09T13:12:46Z_2018-04-09T13:12:46Z_true_11--><article data-id=\"774984766213593598\" data-time=\"1523279566000\" class=\"now-feed-item now-feed-shortstop\" data-behavior=\"\" data-sport=\"41\" data-teams=\"96\"><div class=\"now-content bloom-content\"><h1>Paul Biancardi <span>Basketball Recruiting&nbsp;</span></h1><div class=\"img-container headshot\" data-main-container=\".now-feed-item\"><img class=\"focus-image \" src=\"http://a.espncdn.com/combiner/i?img=/i/columnists/full/biancardi_paul.png&w=160&h=160&scale=crop\"></div><p>E.J. Montgomery no.16 in the ESPN 100 is headed to Kentucky. Atlanta Celtics Program director Hulio Smith tells ESPN, that John Calipari's successful track record of players heading to the NBA, and his plan to get there was the difference.</p></div><div class=\"now-feed_item-meta display-share\" data-src=\"http://www.espn.com/espn/now?nowId=21-0774984766213593598-4\" data-original-src=\"http://www.espn.com/espn/now?nowId=21-0774984766213593598-4\">\n\t\t\t<div class=\"now-share\">\n\t\t\t\t<span class=\"share-count\">share</span>\n\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"share-actions\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"btn-close icon-font-before icon-close-solid-before\"></div>\n\t\t\t\t\t<ul data-id=\"774984766213593598\" data-name=\"E.J. class=\"feed-title\">Now</h2><!--set: now_item_774984766213593598_false_desktop_2018-04-09T13:12:46Z_2018-04-09T13:12:46Z_true_11--><article data-id=\"774984766213593598\" data-time=\"1523279566000\" class=\"now-feed-item now-feed-shortstop\" data-behavior=\"\" data-sport=\"41\" data-teams=\"96\"><div class=\"now-content bloom-content\"><h1>Paul Biancardi <span>Basketball Recruiting&nbsp;</span></h1><div class=\"img-container headshot\" data-main-container=\".now-feed-item\"><img class=\"focus-image \" src=\"http://a.espncdn.com/combiner/i?img=/i/columnists/full/biancardi_paul.png&w=160&h=160&scale=crop\"></div><p>E.J. Montgomery no.16 in the ESPN 100 is headed to Kentucky. Atlanta Celtics Program director Hulio Smith tells ESPN, that John Calipari's successful track record of players heading to the NBA, and his plan to get there was the difference.</p></div><div class=\"now-feed_item-meta display-share\" data-src=\"http://www.espn.com/espn/now?nowId=21-0774984766213593598-4\" data-original-src=\"http://www.espn.com/espn/now?nowId=21-0774984766213593598-4\">\n\t\t\t<div class=\"now-share\">\n\t\t\t\t<span class=\"share-count\">share</span>\n\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"share-actions\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"btn-close icon-font-before icon-close-solid-before\"></div>\n\t\t\t\t\t<ul data-id=\"774984766213593598\" data-name=\"E.J. Hale <span>ESPN Staff Writer&nbsp;</span></h1><div class=\"img-container headshot\" data-main-container=\".now-feed-item\"><img class=\"focus-image lazyload\"  data-lazyload=\"true\" data-src=\"http://a.espncdn.com/combiner/i?img=/i/columnists/hale_david_m.jpg&w=160&h=160&scale=crop\"></div><p>ACC commissioner John Swofford on potentially paying players in college basketball: \"There's no interest of people in higher education to go that route. There's so many complications that come with it.
